base_language.description: Set the language code for a base language which should be used if a string has not been translated to this language. Usually you want to set it to 'en' (English), but for a language variants and dialects set it to the main language. Some world regions might also consider another base language as more appropriate.

lang:current.description: The name of the current language in the native tongue (e.g. "Deutsch" for German)
